meanings.definition: Soft material used to protect or support something.
meanings.sent1: The cushioned seat made the long journey comfortable.
meanings.sent2: She placed a cushioned pad under the fragile vase.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a cushioned box to nap in.
meanings.sent4: The clouds looked like cushioned pillows in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The cushioned lining of the jacket kept him warm in the cold.

meanings.definition: To provide with a cushion or cushions.
meanings.sent1: He cushioned the fall by landing on his hands.
meanings.sent2: She cushioned the chair with soft pillows.
meanings.sent3: The chef cushioned the delicate dessert with whipped cream.
meanings.sent4: The kind words cushioned the blow of the bad news.
meanings.sent5: The flowers cushioned the room with a sweet fragrance.
